name: @blockprotocol/type-system-rs
description: Definitions of types within the Block Protocol Type System

scripts.build:types: INSTA_UPDATE=always mise exec --env dev cargo:cargo-insta -- cargo-insta test --features codegen --test codegen
scripts.build:wasm: mise exec --env prod cargo:wasm-pack -- wasm-pack build --target web --out-name type-system --scope blockprotocol --release . && rm pkg/package.json
scripts.doc:dependency-diagram: cargo run -p hash-repo-chores -- dependency-diagram --output docs/dependency-diagram.mmd --root type-system --root-deps-and-dependents --link-mode non-roots --include-dev-deps --include-build-deps --logging-console-level info
scripts.test:unit: cargo hack nextest run --feature-powerset --all-targets && cargo test --all-features --doc
